   contain the root `toctree` directive.

bcpseg's documentation
======================

.. include:: README.rst

:func:`~bcpseg.bcp_segment.bcpseg` provides a fast implementation of Bayesian Changepoint Segmentation

See the code and discuss development on `GitHub <https://github.com/kylessmith/bcpseg>`__.

If you are interested in additional tools try `BioscienceStack <https://www.biosciencestack.com/documentation/>`__.

.. include:: release-notes.rst

   :maxdepth: 1
   
   api
   tutorial
   installation
